tool_description: Quick and easy to use API for Real-Time financial data
title: EasyFinance

api_list.name: Real-Time Stock
api_list.description: Get multiple information on real-time of a stock.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com/live/stock/{stock}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Real-Time Coin/Cripto
api_list.description: information about a pair of coins in real time. Cryptocurrencies can also be used with this endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com/live/coin/{pair}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Real-Time Fund
api_list.description: Get real-time information of a fund. It is compatible with multiple markets.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com/live/fund/{code}/{country}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easyfinance.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
